channel.title: Oracle Pvp
channel.description:
This server has many great features such as:
Goals: 1. Complete achivement system. 2. Reach 50 players online! 3. Complete a working full screen client. 4. Get forums active. 5. [s]Reach 100 registered accounts.[/s] 6. Reach 200 registered accounts. 7. Reach 500 registered accounts. 8. Post more pics on this topic. 9. Make a offical video! 10. Get some 508 maps. 11. Finish my custom boss, that will "Attack" players randomly during pvp combat, "Pjing" them.
Features: 1. Highscores! 2. AutoDonation System, And A Sms Donation Option For People In The Netherlands And Belgium! 4. All Chaotics! 5. 24/7! 6. Dragon Claws! 7. Player Shops! 8. Slayer Points With Great Rewards! 9. 24/7 Dedicated Vps! 10. Working ring of vigour! 11. Need dev's. as im the only one currently working on the server and client. 12. New combat icons 50% working! Just need to finish server sided packet sending! 13. Fully working slayer helm!
Screen Shots: [img]http://makeagif.com/media/11-03-2011/sKIpPj.gif[/img]
More coming soon!
Please give feedback, negative or positive, just no trolling. Feedback is mainly what im looking for, to see what i should change, remove or add. To give the server a unique feeling.
Thanks for the time, Regards, John Lamontagne

item.title: Oracle Pvp
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:17, topic:421950”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=524632.msg3819822#msg3819822 date=1321669688]

those goals are for server adverting… I think you’re not realizing it. None of his goals are for actual development or editting the server.
[/quote]They are his goals in which he wants to achieve for his server… it doesn’t matter if it’s update related or not, their still his personal goals.

Step 1: Look up
Step 2: Realize the terms “SERVER DEVELOPMENT”
Step 3: Now look to topic
Step 4: Realize that his goals have nothing to do with this.

Where do u see the link between a server and the registered players on a website?

Step 5: Look to an advertisement topic
Step 6: Now look to this

Conclusion: This is a smart advertisement topic, no links so the topic doesn’t get removed, but advertising content + server name

Why should his goals be limited to just development goals. It’s clearly not an advertisement, he has no way of linking people to an actual way to play.

Not to mention the fact that his server on the status page has a 43% uptime.[/quote]

LOl, i gotta fix that ip to my vps’s ip lolololol. Thanks for reminding me

Read full topic

item.title: Oracle Pvp
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:10, topic:421950”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=524632.msg3818930#msg3818930 date=1321585312]
you sir don’t know a troll from something we are saying that is real. It doesn’t fucking matter if you post a link or not, if you’re not even gonna add actually goals like achieving something worth while, then might as well fuck htis right now. Honestly, registered users is nothing more then the number accounts that were created. The online users really count. On armscape I had over 150 registered users in the first month, yet only 10 people online daily.

If you call me a fucking fail coder, how about you look at my fucking releases.

[/quote]Wow dude take a fucking chill pill and sit down.

OT:

I don’t know why everyones flipping out over your registration/player count goals. As long as your not advertising, they’re legit goals to me.

Goodluck man, hope you achieve what your aiming for.[/quote]

those goals are for server adverting… I think you’re not realizing it. None of his goals are for actual development or editting the server.

item.title: Oracle Pvp
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

This server has many great features such as:

Goals:

  1. Complete achivement system.
  2. Reach 50 players online!
  3. Complete a working full screen client.
  4. Get forums active.
  5. Reach 100 registered accounts.
  6. Reach 200 registered accounts.
  7. Reach 500 registered accounts.
  8. Post more pics on this topic.
  9. Make a offical video!
  10. Get some 508 maps.
  11. Finish my custom boss, that will “Attack” players randomly during pvp combat, “Pjing” them.

Features:

  1. Highscores!
  2. AutoDonation System, And A Sms Donation Option For People In The Netherlands And Belgium!
  3. All Chaotics!
  4. 24/7!
  5. Dragon Claws!
  6. Player Shops!
  7. Slayer Points With Great Rewards!
  8. 24/7 Dedicated Vps!
  9. Working ring of vigour!
  10. Need dev’s. as im the only one currently working on the server and client.
  11. New combat icons 50% working! Just need to finish server sided packet sending!
  12. Fully working slayer helm!

Screen Shots:

More coming soon!

Please give feedback, negative or positive, just no trolling. Feedback is mainly what im looking for, to see what i should change, remove or add. To give the server a unique feeling.

Thanks for the time,
Regards,
John Lamontagne

Read full topic
